CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable cameras
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables all cameras on the device. If this settings is checked, no applications running will be able to access any cameras on the device

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Encrypt device
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If the storage system is not encrypted, starts the encryption wizard

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Connect only to secured WiFis
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled, this setting will not allow the device to connect to unsecured access points

ListPreference.android:title: Lock screen timeout
ListPreference.android:summary: Adjust the time it will take the screen to get turn off and lock the device. To increase the security of your device, the application enforces a maximum timeout of 3 minutes

ListPreference.android:title: Maximum failed password attempts
ListPreference.android:summary: Specifies how many times a user can enter the wrongg password before the device wipes its data. This secures data in case the device is lost or stolen
